name: Affiliates-CRC
author: Farhan Sabir

sections.description:
Affiliates Coupon Re-Calculate (CRC) or Affiliates-CRC
is a plugin for Recalculation of Coupons so that the affiliates get the credit of their assigned coupon codes. Currently, this
functionality is not included in Affiliates PRO. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK BACKUP YOUR DATABASE AND WORDPRESS FILES

When a customer signs in using a coupon code, and that coupon code is assigned to an affiliate, you can use this plugin to apply “referral” credit to that particular affiliate whose coupon code has been used in the order.
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins
  2. Add New
  3. Browse and upload
  4. activate the plugin
sections.faq: Does the plugin make any changes to the database? The plugin creates a new table, and changes encoding of affiliates tables to make them compatible. Instructions are included on the admin index page of the Affiliates CRC.

short_description: Affiliates Coupon ReCalculate (CRC) Contributors: farhansabir Version: 0.9 Beta Requires at least: Directory Press and Affiliates (PRO) License: GPLv2 …
